body.paragraph: A conditional statement that can only be used after an if statement and allows us to add more cases to create an if block. It executes only if the statements above it evaluate to false.
elif statements allow us to group related conditions together and we can have multiple of them in one if block.

tooltip.title: Insert Elif Statement
tooltip.body: Short for else-if; adds another case to an existing if statement. The `elif` will only run when previous `if` or `elif` statement is false

using elif after another elif statement
